title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: This RFC proposes a clear definition of the project scope, objectives, and high-level requirements for the RequirementsAI assistant. The project aims to develop an AI model capable of interpreting and structuring software requirements from stakeholder inputs using advanced natural language processing (NLP) techniques, machine learning, user interface design, and integration with existing development workflows. The assistant should be able to convert unstructured stakeholder inputs into structured requirements, allowing for efficient and effective management of project requirements. It is crucial to consider accessibility standards, scalability, security aspects, maintainability, and performance in the development process. The RFC will also outline the testing and documentation processes, focusing on thorough unit testing, integration testing, system testing, functional testing, performance testing, and stress testing. Additionally, it will emphasize the importance of clear and concise technical documentation for the project, including design documents, API specifications, user guides, and release notes. Lastly, the RFC encourages collaboration with other teams to ensure a cohesive development process, and encourages regular code reviews and pair programming sessions. If approved, this RFC will be ready for implementation and assigned to the code-architect for further task decomposition.

title: Design system architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop natural language processing (NLP) module
description: Implement the NLP module to convert stakeholder inputs into structured requirements.

title: Build requirements management system
description: Develop the core system for managing and organizing software requirements.

title: Create user interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for interacting with the RequirementsAI assistant.

title: Set up data storage and management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for requirements and related data.

title: Implement security measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and implement necessary security measures.

title: Set up continuous integration and deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Write documentation and user guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the RequirementsAI assistant.

title: Conduct testing and quality assurance
description: Plan and execute thorough testing and quality assurance activities for the RequirementsAI assistant.
dependencies: Set up data storage and management
